title: Trying Out Prot's Denote, an Org Roam Alternative?

media:group.media:title: Trying Out Prot's Denote, an Org Roam Alternative?
media:group.media:description:
In today's stream, we'll try out Prot's new note-taking package called Denote and see if we can come up with a comparable workflow to what you might get from a package like Org Roam.  I really like the principles that Prot chose for this package so I'm looking forward to experimenting with it!
